message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $90. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be very happy with it.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $70 is just too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $85.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $85 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, can we do $77.50?
